Class HibernateHelper

    Class with helper method to work with Hibernate

      • addPeriodParameterToQuery

        public static void addPeriodParameterToQuery(java.lang.StringBuilder hql,
                             java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> namedParameters,
                             java.lang.String path,
                             Period period)
        Adds a period test to the HQL query, if the given period is not empty, appending the value to the named parameters map. See Period, as it controls whether the begin and end dates are inclusive / exclusive.
